author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two youths, K. Malairajan (19) of Mullai Nagar and P. Satheeshkumar (18) of Chinna Udaippu, were killed when a State-run bus hit their two-wheeler near Chinna Udaippu on Tuesday night.

Police said that the deceased were working in a workshop along Ring Road. They were riding the bike on the Ring Road when a Nagercoil-bound bus knocked down their vehicle around 10 p.m.

Angry residents of nearby areas smashed the window panes of the bus. Over 100 people squatted on the road and disrupted the traffic for 45 minutes.
title: Two killed as bus hits bike
